name: BoltJam9 - Steam Pandas
description:
Steam Pandas is an entry into Bolt Jam 9. Built in Unity 2019.4 using Bolt.

I've used the red panda from Malbers Animations low poly forest animals.

Trees and grass texture from Synty - Polygon Nature.

And the character model from Synty - Polygon Construction.

Controls:Mouse left and right to rotate/look around.
WASD to walk and move.

SPACE to pick up a bucket of water or block of coal (red cube).

Bugs: You can get snagged on the edges, so turn around when you hit one to walk away. Dont get wedged in by a panda!

DONT PRESS SPACE when not in front of something to pickup. it might bug out and think you have something in your hand.

CTRL+SHIFT+ESC to exit via task manager. I didn't build an exit option yet.
